definition: to lose one's love/to break up (in a romantic relationship)/to feel jilted
to feel attached to/to long for/to love

sentences.english: Who can say he looks like a lovelorn who has just parted with girlfreind?
sentences.chinese: 有誰會看出來這是一個新近失戀的人嗎？

sentences.english: They can be assisted to forget the unpleasant past and to seek for a better future.
sentences.chinese: 服務人員可協助失戀者忘記過去，展望未來。

sentences.english: When out of love, the most pleasant spring will lose its luster.
sentences.chinese: 倘若失戀，多好的春天，也會黯然無光。

sentences.english: I was lovelorn, how can you lose me.
sentences.chinese: 我失戀了，你怎麼可以把我弄丟了。

sentences.english: If I am disppointed in love, I will try .
sentences.chinese: 如果我正好失戀了，我回去嘗試的。

sentences.english: Oneself brokenhearted many times, every brokenhearted empress of make of affair all dissimilarity.
sentences.chinese: 本人失戀多次，每一次失戀後的作的事情都不同。

sentences.english: Oneself brokenhearted many times, every brokenhearted empress of make of affair all dissimilarity.
sentences.chinese: 本人失戀多次，每一次失戀後的作的事情都不同。

sentences.english: What relics from past romances would YOU leave in the Museum of Broken Hearts?
sentences.chinese: 從過去的戀情中，你能在失戀博物館留下什麼紀念品？

sentences.english: When we lose a love, for instance, we fight our feelings of heartbreak.
sentences.chinese: 例如，當我們失戀時，我們與心碎的悲痛感抗爭。

sentences.english: Kara ok software web site sent by the combination of deductive Grasshoppers oldies "High Fidelity."
sentences.chinese: 網站送上由草蜢組合演繹的老歌失戀。

sentences.english: Well, the leave increases with age of the employee.
sentences.chinese: 失戀假會隨着員工的年齡而增加。

sentences.english: When out of love， the most pleasant spring will lose its luster.
sentences.chinese: 倘若失戀，多好的春天，也會黯淡無光。

sentences.english: We're terrified of ending relationships. We're always hoping the "fade-away" will work for us.
sentences.chinese: 我們害怕結束感情，不希望自己陷入失戀的痛苦中。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, Mr. Zhou is still lovelorn.
sentences.chinese: 與此同時，周先生仍然處在失戀的痛苦中。

sentences.english: Two people feeling cold, Zheng Yien into the state of love.
sentences.chinese: 二人感情冷淡，鄭藝恩進入失戀狀態。

definition: to feel sad/to feel unwell/(of life) to be difficult
to grieve/to be broken-hearted/to feel deeply hurt
to court/to go steady/to be dating
to feel unwell/to suffer pain/to be difficult to bear
